mapper.select: SELECT b.boardNo, b.nickName, b.userNo, b.title, b.boardContent, b.createAt, b.b_readhit, b.isPinned, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Comments c WHERE c.boardNo = b.boardNo AND c.is_deleted = 0) AS commentCount FROM Board b ORDER BY b.isPinned DESC, b.boardNo DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Board (boardNo, nickName, userNo, title, boardContent, createAt, b_readhit, isPinned) VALUES (board_no_seq.NEXTVAL, #{nickName}, #{userNo}, #{title}, #{boardContent}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 0, #{isPinned})
